We look after your film project from the first draft of the script through to the final edit.

Our core operating area is Ireland and the UK.

We also work with a range of international companies and can complete work worldwide as appropriate.

We hope you find the information you are looking for by browsing through our website. If you have a specific query please get in touch by contacting us.
